initialize(address,address,address).details: Initialize the contract by setting token address, depositor address, and investment handler address, and approving the investment handler to spend the project token, which enables claims to be made.

documentation.text:
@dev Initialize the contract by setting token address, depositor address, and investment handler address,
and approving the investment handler to spend the project token, which enables claims to be made.
